tr.td:
This Questionnaire instance defines the questions and possible answers in the following CDC NHSN forms:
MDRO and CDI Monthly Monitoring for LTCF (CDC 57.139)
Denominators for LTCF (CDC 57.142)
Prevention Process Measures Form for LTCF (CDC 57.143)

title.value: MDRO and CDI LabID Event Reporting Monthly Summary Data for LTCF

description.value: This Questionnaire instance defines the questions and possible answers in the following CDC NHSN forms: * [MDRO and CDI Monthly Monitoring for LTCF (CDC 57.139)](https://www.cdc.gov/nhsn/forms/57.139_MDROMonthlyReporting_LTCF_BLANK.pdf) * [Denominators for LTCF (CDC 57.142](https://www.cdc.gov/nhsn/forms/57.142_DenominatorLTCF_BLANK.pdf) * [Prevention Process Measures Form for LTCF (CDC 57.143)](https://www.cdc.gov/nhsn/forms/57.143_ProcessMeasureSummaryforLTCF_BLANK.pdf)

display.value: Healthcare Associated Infection report Document
Summary data reporting MDRO and CDI LabID Event for LTCF

text.value: Facility ID
First Day of Period Reported
Last Day of Period Reported
Facility Location Code

display.value: Population Summary note

text.value: Summary Data Group
The Summary Data Group is a set of summary data for a population in the defined NHSN protocol.
Summary Data Group - Denominator
The Summary Data Group - Denominator is a set of summary data reported using the CDC NHSN form: [Denominators for LTCF (CDC 57.142](https://www.cdc.gov/nhsn/forms/57.142_DenominatorLTCF_BLANK.pdf).

display.value: Total Resident Days

text.value: Resident Days

display.value: Number of urinary catheter days

text.value: Urinary Catheter Days

display.value: New antibiotic starts for UTI indication

text.value: New Antibiotic Starts for UTI Indication

display.value: Number of urine cultures ordered

text.value: Number of Urine Cultures Ordered
Summary Data Group - MDRO/CDI

The Summary Data Group - MDRO/CDI is a set of summary data reported using the CDC NHSN form: [MDRO and CDI Monthly Monitoring for LTCF (CDC 57.139)](https://www.cdc.gov/nhsn/forms/57.139_MDROMonthlyReporting_LTCF_BLANK.pdf).

display.value: Resident days

text.value: Resident Days

display.value: Resident admissions

text.value: Resident Admissions

display.value: Number of admissions on C. difficile treatment

text.value: Number of admissions on C. difficile treatment

display.value: Number of C. difficile treatment starts

text.value: Number of C. difficile treatment starts
Summary Data Group - Prevention Process Measures

The Summary Data Group - Preventions Process Measures is a set of summary data reported using the CDC NHSN form: [Prevention Process Measures Form for LTCF (CDC 57.143)](https://www.cdc.gov/nhsn/forms/57.143_ProcessMeasureSummaryforLTCF_BLANK.pdf).
